ca.weblite.codename1.db

Class DAOProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.weblite.codename1.db.DAOProvider

  • public class DAOProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    A provider for DAO objects in a database. You would generally instantiate one DAOProvider object per database, and you would register one DAO per table in the database that you need to use. A default, generic DAO implementation is provided for tables that you don't explicitly register with custom DAO classes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DAOProvider

        public DAOProvider(com.codename1.db.Database db,
           int schemaVersion)
        Constructor to create a provider for the given database and with the given schema version. This version of the constructor uses a default config file path of /config.sql. So you should place your config file in a file named config.sql in the src root.
        Parameters:
        db - The database to operate on.
        schemaVersion - The schema version.

      • get

        public DAO get(java.lang.String tableName)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the DAO object for the specified table name. If none is registered, it will instantiate a new GenericDAO object for the given table and register it.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The table name.
        Returns:
        The DAO corresponding to the table name.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • set

        public void set(java.lang.String tableName,
       DAO dao)
        Registers a DAO for the given table name.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The table name.
        dao - The DAO object to use for interacting with the table.
